hero_tag: I build things for the web.
hero_description: I'm a software engineer based in Paramaribo, Suriname, specializing in building (and occasionally designing) exceptional websites, applications, and everything in between.
about_desc1: Hello! I'm Shayant, a software engineer based in Paramaribo, Suriname.
about_desc2: I enjoy creating things that live on the internet, whether that be websites, applications, or anything in between. My goal is to always build products that provide pixel-perfect, performant experiences.
about_desc3: Currently i'm studying Software Engineering at the University of Applied Sciences & technology where i'll soon recieve my bacholar.
about_desc4: Late 2018 i joined the development team at Telesur where I work on a wide variety of interesting and meaningful projects on a daily basis.
about_desc5: Here are a few technologies I've been working with recently:
contact_body: Although I'm currently not looking for any new opportunities, my inbox is always open. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, I'll try my best to get back to you!
